column1: I understand the information presented on FMCG product labels and am satisfied with the clarity of these claims.
column2: How often do you read FMCG product labels to check for environmental claims (e.g., recyclable, sustainable, biodegradable)?
column3: Have you ever seen an FMCG product that made environmental claims on its label that you found to be exaggerated or false?
column4: How confident are you in identifying misleading or false environmental claims on FMCG product labels?
